data.name: VR HOT
data.detailed_description:
VR what?
VR HOT is a digital toy for creating and interacting with dream partners. It gives you the opportunity to explore your most intimate desires in a non-judgmental surrounding. VR HOT offers a virtual environment and a construction kit for dream partners and the interaction with them.

VR unique
Embodiment - you are not just a pair of gloves, you have a fully customizable virtual body.
Interaction - it's not just a doll you are playing with. They talk, they move, they react.
Voice commands - let them know what you want. Whether by using the menu or telling them.
New innovative physics system - combining state-of-the-art physics with animations.
Thrust control - let your controller track your hip movements.
Customizability - create and save your own characters - male or female.
Makeup system - who are we to dictate your favorite lipstick color? The makeup police?


VR ethically responsible
You can be and play whatever you want. VR HOT offers all possible binary gender combinations. Play a male or a female with a male or female Hottie!
Humanity is colorful, and we want to be as ethnically diverse as possible.
We think promoting anything but consensual sex is wrong. This said, we don’t want to kink shame. You will find rough, but you won’t find an easy victim.

data.short_description: VR HOT is a VR adult experience for creating and interacting with dream partners (m/f). It gives you the opportunity to explore your most intimate desires in a non-judgmental surrounding. VR HOT offers a virtual environment and a construction kit for dream partners and the interaction with them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Steam VR needs to be installed. All SteamVR-compatible headsets (not standalone) should be compatible. Compatibility tested and confirmed for Oculus Quest 1 (with Link) and Valve Index.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7XXX series or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Steam VR needs to be installed. All SteamVR-compatible headsets (not standalone) should be compatible. Compatibility tested and confirmed for Oculus Quest 1 (with Link) and Valve Index.

content_descriptors.notes:
VR HOT is an adult VR experience for creating and interacting with dream partners. VR HOT offers a virtual environment and a construction kit for dream partners and the interaction with them. 

You can play different levels of nudity - from fully dressed to fully nude, including realistic depiction of male and female genitalia. You can play interaction (so far) between a male player and a female character - from touching and stroking to full penetration, oral and vaginal. You can spank her butt, but there is only consensual sex.
